body:
Comment 3: 
Seems like the door had been closed and locked.

TCP data cannot be sent over raw sockets.
http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windows/desktop/ms740548(v=vs.85).aspx

FWIW, both socket catapult routines fd.dial and fd.listenDatagram are used for the
endpoint holders that open the other connection, such as talking to the protocol stack
inside the kernel (e.g., raw sockets). See comments on socket in net/sock_posix.go.
_Status changed to **Retracted**._
